document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b844ff">Morning, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">comes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">once, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b844ff">Considers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70fc70">coming </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">twice </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Two </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cca8ff">Dawns </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">upon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff346c">Single </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cca8ff">Morn </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70fc70">Make </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff346c">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b844ff">sudden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff346c">price </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
